text: First Chip N' Dale track you've posted =). My twin brother and I used to play this game on the two player mode all the time when we were little. Was so hard to beat it by myself but if we worked together we stomped the game lol. I havn't heard this tune in 15 years but as soon as i started listening to it I could hum along with it. Pretty awesome!!!
